verses.verse: And <WG2532> I looked,<WG1492> and,<WG2532> lo,<WG2400> a Lamb<WG721> stood<WG2476> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> mount<WG3735> Zion,<WG4622> and<WG2532> with<WG3326> him<WG846> a hundred forty and four thousand,<WG1540> <WG5062> <WG5064> <WG5505> having<WG2192> his<WG848> Father's<WG3962> name<WG3686> written<WG1125> in<WG1909> their<WG848> foreheads.<WG3359>

And <WG2532> I heard<WG191> a voice<WG5456> from<WG1537> heaven,<WG3772> as<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of many<WG4183> waters,<WG5204> and<WG2532> as<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of a great<WG3173> thunder:<WG1027> and<WG2532> I heard<WG191> the voice<WG5456> of harpers<WG2790> harping<WG2789> with<WG1722> their<WG848> harps: <WG2788>

And <WG2532> they sung<WG103> as it were<WG5613> a new<WG2537> song<WG5603> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> throne,<WG2362> and<WG2532> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> four<WG5064> beasts,<WG2226> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> elders:<WG4245> and<WG2532> no man<WG3762> could<WG1410> learn<WG3129> that song<WG5603> but<WG1508> the<WG3588> hundred and forty and four thousand,<WG1540> <WG5062> <WG5064> <WG5505> which were redeemed<WG59> from<WG575> the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>

These <WG3778> are<WG1526> they which<WG3739> were not<WG3756> defiled<WG3435> with<WG3326> women;<WG1135> for<WG1063> they are<WG1526> virgins.<WG3933> These<WG3778> are<WG1526> they which follow<WG190> the<WG3588> Lamb<WG721> whithersoever<WG3699> <WG302> he goeth.<WG5217> These<WG3778> were redeemed<WG59> from<WG575> among men,<WG444> being the firstfruits<WG536> unto God<WG2316> and<WG2532> to the<WG3588> Lamb.<WG721>

And <WG2532> in<WG1722> their<WG848> mouth<WG4750> was found<WG2147> no<WG3756> guile:<WG1388> for<WG1063> they are<WG1526> without fault<WG299> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> throne<WG2362> of God.<WG2316>

And <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> another<WG243> angel<WG32> fly<WG4072> in<WG1722> the midst of heaven,<WG3321> having<WG2192> the everlasting<WG166> gospel<WG2098> to preach<WG2097> unto them that dwell<WG2730> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> to every<WG3956> nation,<WG1484> and<WG2532> kindred,<WG5443> and<WG2532> tongue,<WG1100> and<WG2532> people,<WG2992>

Saying <WG3004> with<WG1722> a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> Fear<WG5399> God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> give<WG1325> glory<WG1391> to him;<WG846> for<WG3754> the<WG3588> hour<WG5610> of his<WG848> judgment<WG2920> is come:<WG2064> and<WG2532> worship<WG4352> him that made<WG4160> heaven,<WG3772> and<WG2532> earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> and<WG2532> the fountains<WG4077> of waters.<WG5204>

And <WG2532> there followed<WG190> another<WG243> angel,<WG32> saying,<WG3004> Babylon<WG897> is fallen,<WG4098> is fallen,<WG4098> that great<WG3173> city,<WG4172> because<WG3754> she made all nations drink<WG4222> <WG1484> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> wine<WG3631> of the<WG3588> wrath<WG2372> of her<WG848> fornication.<WG4202>

And <WG2532> the third<WG5154> angel<WG32> followed<WG190> them,<WG846> saying<WG3004> with<WG1722> a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> If any man<WG1536> worship<WG4352> the<WG3588> beast<WG2342> and<WG2532> his<WG848> image,<WG1504> and<WG2532> receive<WG2983> his mark<WG5480> in<WG1909> his<WG848> forehead,<WG3359> or<WG2228> in<WG1909> his<WG848> hand,<WG5495>

The same<WG846> shall<WG2532> drink<WG4095> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> wine<WG3631> of the<WG3588> wrath<WG2372> of God,<WG2316> which is poured out<WG2767> without mixture<WG194> into<WG1722> the<WG3588> cup<WG4221> of his<WG848> indignation;<WG3709> and<WG2532> he shall be tormented<WG928> with<WG1722> fire<WG4442> and<WG2532> brimstone<WG2303> in the presence<WG1799> of the<WG3588> holy<WG40> angels,<WG32> and<WG2532> in the presence<WG1799> of the<WG3588> Lamb: <WG721>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> smoke<WG2586> of their<WG848> torment<WG929> ascendeth up<WG305> forever and ever:<WG1519> <WG165> <WG165> and<WG2532> they have<WG2192> no<WG3756> rest<WG372> day<WG2250> nor<WG2532> night,<WG3571> who worship<WG4352> the<WG3588> beast<WG2342> and<WG2532> his<WG848> image,<WG1504> and<WG2532> whosoever<WG1536> receiveth<WG2983> the<WG3588> mark<WG5480> of his<WG848> name.<WG3686>

Here <WG5602> is<WG2076> the patience<WG5281> of the<WG3588> saints:<WG40> here<WG5602> are they that keep<WG5083> the<WG3588> commandments<WG1785> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> faith<WG4102> of Jesus.<WG2424>

And <WG2532> I heard<WG191> a voice<WG5456> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772> saying<WG3004> unto me,<WG3427> Write,<WG1125> Blessed<WG3107> are the<WG3588> dead<WG3498> which die<WG599> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> from henceforth:<WG534> Yea,<WG3483> saith<WG3004> the<WG3588> Spirit,<WG4151> that<WG2443> they may rest<WG373> from<WG1537> their<WG848> labors;<WG2873> and<WG1161> their<WG848> works<WG2041> do follow<WG190> <WG3326> them.<WG846>

And <WG2532> I looked,<WG1492> and<WG2532> behold<WG2400> a white<WG3022> cloud,<WG3507> and<WG2532> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> cloud<WG3507> one sat<WG2521> like unto<WG3664> the Son<WG5207> of man,<WG444> having<WG2192> on<WG1909> his<WG848> head<WG2776> a golden<WG5552> crown,<WG4735> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> his<WG848> hand<WG5495> a sharp<WG3691> sickle.<WG1407>

And <WG2532> another<WG243> angel<WG32> came<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> temple,<WG3485> crying<WG2896> with<WG1722> a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> to him that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> cloud,<WG3507> Thrust in<WG3992> thy<WG4675> sickle,<WG1407> and<WG2532> reap:<WG2325> for<WG3754> the<WG3588> time<WG5610> is come<WG2064> for thee<WG4671> to reap;<WG2325> for<WG3754> the<WG3588> harvest<WG2326> of the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> is ripe.<WG3583>

And <WG2532> he that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> cloud<WG3507> thrust in<WG906> his<WG848> sickle<WG1407> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth;<WG1093> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> was reaped.<WG2325>

And <WG2532> another<WG243> angel<WG32> came<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> temple<WG3485> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> he<WG846> also<WG2532> having<WG2192> a sharp<WG3691> sickle.<WG1407>

And <WG2532> another<WG243> angel<WG32> came<WG1831> out from<WG1537> the<WG3588> altar,<WG2379> which had<WG2192> power<WG1849> over<WG1909> fire;<WG4442> and<WG2532> cried<WG5455> with a loud<WG3173> cry<WG2906> to him that had<WG2192> the<WG3588> sharp<WG3691> sickle,<WG1407> saying,<WG3004> Thrust in<WG3992> thy<WG4675> sharp<WG3691> sickle,<WG1407> and<WG2532> gather<WG5166> the<WG3588> clusters<WG1009> of the<WG3588> vine<WG288> of the<WG3588> earth;<WG1093> for<WG3754> her<WG848> grapes<WG4718> are fully ripe.<WG187>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> angel<WG32> thrust in<WG906> his<WG848> sickle<WG1407> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> gathered<WG5166> the<WG3588> vine<WG288> of the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> cast<WG906> it into<WG1519> the<WG3588> great<WG3173> winepress<WG3025> of the<WG3588> wrath<WG2372> of God.<WG2316>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> winepress<WG3025> was trodden<WG3961> without<WG1854> the<WG3588> city,<WG4172> and<WG2532> blood<WG129> came<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> winepress,<WG3025> even unto<WG891> the<WG3588> horse<WG2462> bridles,<WG5469> by the space of<WG575> a thousand and six hundred<WG5507> <WG1812> furlongs.<WG4712>
